Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.service

Interface EmployeeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmployeeServiceImpl
public interface EmployeeService
Service interface for managing Employee entities. Declares methods for standard CRUD operations and additional operations such as pagination and sorting.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteEmployeeById​(java.lang.Long id)
    Deletes and Employee from the database.
    org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Employee> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
    Retrieves a paginated list of Employees sorted by a specific field and direction.
    java.util.List<Employee> getAllEmployees()
    Retrieves all Employee Objects.
    Employee getEmployeeById​(java.lang.Long id)
    Retrieves an employee by a specific ID number.
    void saveEmployee​(Employee employee)
    Saves an Employee to the database.

  • Method Details

    • getAllEmployees

      java.util.List<Employee> getAllEmployees()
      Retrieves all Employee Objects.
      Returns:
      a list of Employee Objects.

    • getEmployeeById

      Employee getEmployeeById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Retrieves an employee by a specific ID number.
      Parameters:
      id - Long representing the employee in the database.
      Returns:
      an Employee Object.

    • saveEmployee

      void saveEmployee​(Employee employee)
      Saves an Employee to the database.
      Parameters:
      employee - Employee Object to be saved to the database.

    • deleteEmployeeById

      void deleteEmployeeById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes and Employee from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - Long representing the employee in the database.

    • findPaginated

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Employee> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated list of Employees sorted by a specific field and direction.
      Parameters:
      pageNo - The page number to retrieve, starting from 1.
      pageSize - The number of Employees per page.
      sortField - The field by which to sort the Employees.
      sortDirection - The direction to sort the Employees. This should be 'ASC' for ascending order or 'DESC' for descending order.
      Returns:
      A Page of Employees based on the given page number and size, sorted by the given field and direction.
